subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement I : When a capillary tube is dipped into a liquid, the liquid neither rises nor falls in the capillary. The contact angle may be . Statement II : The contact angle between a solid

options.text: (1) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
(2) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(3) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(4) Statement I is true and Statement II is false
and a liquid is a property of the material of the solid and liquid as well. In the light of the above statement,
